Transcript.Content: [customer connecting with agent - disregard]
Hi. I am the Adobe Virtual Assistant. How can I help?
password reset
{"genericAttachments":[{"title":"You need help changing the password for your Adobe account. Is that right?","buttons":[{"text":"Yes","value":"Yes"},{"text":"No","value":"No"}]}]}
Yes
Go to your privacy and security settings at adobe.com/go/stage-change-password
Under Password, click Change.
(Minimize the chat to see all the details.)

{"genericAttachments":[{"title":"Did that help?","buttons":[{"text":"Yes","value":"Yes","click":{"actions":[{"text":"Yes","type":"publishText"}]}},{"text":"No","value":"No","click":{"actions":[{"text":"No","type":"publishText"}]}}]}]}
No

{"genericAttachments":[{"title":"Would you like to chat with an agent?","buttons":[{"text":"Yes, chat with an agent","value":"Yes, chat with an agent","click":{"actions":[{"text":"Yes, chat with an agent","type":"publishText"}]}},{"text":"No","value":"No","click":{"actions":[{"text":"No","type":"publishText"}]}}]}]}
Yes, chat with an agent
Ok. I'll connect you to an agent who can pick up where we've left off.
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_MESSAGE_Your estimated wait time is currently less than one minute
Connecting you with a senior specialist as soon as possible.
Plan change request

CUSTOM_SYSTEM_MESSAGE_You are now connected to Samiksha, who is reviewing your account. If you need to share sensitive information, such as credit card number, please wait for your agent to give you steps to share it securely.
Hello, I'd be happy to help you today, let me first pull up your account information and access your details.
ok

As I can see, you need assistance with password reset and plan change.
Therefore. let's proceed with password reset link first and then we will help you in plan change as well.
Kindly visit your email account and click on the password reset link and reset the password.
Let me know once you are done or if you face any issue.
I have rested my password. I just want to change my pan. Please let me know how can we proceed?

Sure.
Let us assist you for the same.
Kindly let me know what plan do you want to change to?
Please let me know what do I have under my account?
You have a photoshop subscription on Annual Commitment / Monthly Billing basis commitment under your account.
Pleas switch me to a photography plan and let me know what will it cost?
Please*

Photography plan is available under 2 billings, mentioned below:
Annual, paid monthly
US$9.99/mo 
Annual, prepaid
US$119.88/yr 

Kindly let me know, which billing pattern you want to follow?
Okay. I want the one that is for 9.99USD.

Sure, Let me switch your photoshop plan to photography plan at 9.99USD/Month for annual commitment.
Kindly allow me 2 minutes.
ok

First, s per the calculation, a refund amount of 3.86 USD (exclusive of tax) / 3.86 USD (inclusive of tax) will be credited to the payment medium registered.
Also, the payable amount for the subscription will be 9.99USD Inclusive of tax/monthly for an year commitment.
Kindly verify last 4 digits of your credit card attached to your adobe account.
Thank you for the refund. last 4 digits are 1111

Kindly reply with "I Agree' to T&Cs:

Subscription Terms:
Your subscription begins as soon as your initial payment is processed. Your subscription will automatically renew annually without notice until you cancel. You authorize us to store your payment method(s) and to automatically charge your payment method(s) every month until you cancel. We will automatically charge you the then-current rate for your plan, plus applicable taxes (such as VAT or GST if the rate does not include it), every month of your annual contract until you cancel.

We may change your plan’s rate each annual renewal term, and we will notify you of any rate change with the option to cancel. If the applicable VAT or GST rate (or other included tax or duty) changes during your one-year term, we will accordingly adjust the tax-inclusive price for your plan mid-term on your next billing date.

If your primary payment method fails, you authorize us to charge any other payment method in your account. If you have not provided us a backup paymen

t method(s) and you fail to provide payment, or if all payment methods in your account fail, we may suspend your subscription. You can edit your payment information anytime in your Adobe Account page.

Cancellation Terms:
You can cancel your subscription anytime via your Adobe Account page or by contacting Customer Support*. If you cancel within 14 days of your initial order, you’ll be fully refunded. Should you cancel after 14 days, you’ll be charged a lump sum amount of 50% of your remaining contract obligation and your service will continue until the end of that month’s billing period.
I agree

First, Kindly find the new order details below:
New Order : HB01586700125CUS
Next billing date: 28th July 2022
Next payable amount: 9.99USD


Also, you will get your refund in next 5 to 7 business days.
Thank you for your quick assistance. I appriciate it.
Happy to help. You may receive an email with a survey link. Please take a moment to rate your experience and help us improve. Thanks!
